priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Tumor Identification Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C96783

self.title: CDISC SDTM Tumor Identification Test Name Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the test names that describe tumor or lesion assessments for identification purposes.
name: Tumor or Lesion Identification Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Tumor Identification Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Tumor or Lesion Identification Test Name

terms.definition: A description of the region or relative location for the disease recurrence.
An indication that a graft with a lesion has been located and characterized.
An indication that a lesion has been located and characterized.
An indication that a limb containing a lesion has been selected and characterized.
A classification of malignant disease manifestation as part of the response assessment.
An indication that multiple tumors have coalesced into one tumor.
An indication that a single tumor has divided into two or more tumors.
An indication that a vessel with a lesion has been located and characterized.
